messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [Rr]oom [0-9]+'

Imagine a world with twelve rooms. From the lobby you have two choices, room 1 and room 2. You enter room 1, at the end there’s a door that leads to room 3, and room 3 leads to room 5. There is a door in room 5 that leads to room 7 and room 7 leads to room 9. From room 9 you can enter room 11. There’s a chest in room 11. You open it and there is 10 dollars, but you do not take any money, you’re just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the lobby you choose room 2, then enter room 4, which leads to room 6. There is a door in room 6 that leads to room 8 and room 8 leads to room 10. At the end there is a door that leads to room 12. There’s a chest with 50 dollars in room 12, but you do not take any money, you’re just learning about the environment. You return to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which room from the lobby will lead to the path where one can make the most money?

Step 1: Identify the two paths from the lobby.
Path 1: Room 1 -> Room 3 -> Room 5 -> Room 7 -> Room 9 -> Room 11
Path 2: Room 2 -> Room 4 -> Room 6 -> Room 8 -> Room 10 -> Room 12

Step 2: Determine the amount of money in the chest at the end of each path.
Path 1: Room 11 has a chest with 10 dollars.
Path 2: Room 12 has a chest with 50 dollars.

Step 3: Compare the amounts of money in the chests and identify the path with the most money.
Path 2 has more money (50 dollars) than Path 1 (10 dollars).

Step 4: Determine the room from the lobby that leads to the path with the most money.
Answer: Room 2

You enter the lobby and this time you encounter a new room, room 13. Room 13’s door leads to room 14, and room 14 leads to room 15. Room 15’s door leads to room 16, and room 16 leads to room 17. Room 17’s door leads to room 18 and room 18 has an all-access door that can take you to any room you want. When you return to the lobby and choose the path that leads to the most reward, you discover that the regular door to the room with the most money is blocked. You go back to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which room from the lobby will lead to the path where one can make the most money?

Step 1: Identify the three paths from the lobby.
Path 1: Room 1 -> Room 3 -> Room 5 -> Room 7 -> Room 9 -> Room 11
Path 2: Room 2 -> Room 4 -> Room 6 -> Room 8 -> Room 10 -> Room 12 (blocked)
Path 3: Room 13 -> Room 14 -> Room 15 -> Room 16 -> Room 17 -> Room 18 (all-access door)

Step 2: Determine the path that leads to the most money, considering the blocked door.
Since the door to Room 12 is blocked, Path 2 is no longer an option. 

Step 3: Choose the path that leads to the all-access door, which can take you to any room.
Path 3 leads to Room 18, which has an all-access door.

Step 4: Determine the room from the lobby that leads to the path with the most money, considering the new situation.
Answer: Room 13
